results.content: I see the content to be easy to understand. And this course has a decent pace. We have been working on Excel but this course truly helps us explore functions & more that would help us be time-efficient at work. I would recommend this training course to graduates who are about to start their careers & every employee who works on Excel but knows very little about its functionality.
